name: Destroy
description:
It depicts two falling bomb (Top and Mid Right) and an atomic like explosion. (Bottom right).

For more pictures of Destoy, Please Click Here. -- Painted with acrylic paint mixed with textile medium and fabric paint, on a 50/50 cotton polyester blend Jerzee Brand t-shirt. Wash normally, or as clothing directs. -- Every shirt order comes with one FREE patch, and a hand written essay about the shirt. -- Location, color, and size of bleach marks will differ from shirt to shirt, based on the concentration of the bleach and size of the nozzle used. -- We are currently NOT shipping outside of the US under normal circumstances. If you REALLY want the item shipped somewhere other than the states, you can plead your case directly. -- These shirts are MADE TO ORDER. Therefore, the shirt isn't made until payment is sent in. Please allow at least two(2) weeks for delivery. -- Since these shirts are made when ordered, ALL SALES ARE FINAL. -- All transactions are done via Paypal.

name: Float
description:
This shirt has several bubbles in the top left corner and in the middle of the biggest is a red heart, and at the bottom right corner there is a little doodle, wallowing in misery.
For more pictures of Float, Please Click Here. -- Painted with acrylic paint mixed with textile medium, on a 50/50 cotton polyester blend Jerzee Brand t-shirt. Wash normally, or as clothing directs. -- Every shirt order comes with one FREE patch, and a hand written essay about the shirt. -- This shirt has customizable parts.
